message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000. It's a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
Alice, thank you for the offer, but $18000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm very interested in the product, but I'm only able to go up to $13000 at this time.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $13000 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $16500. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.

Alice, while I appreciate your willingness to compromise, $16500 is still a bit more than I can comfortably afford at this time. I'm willing to go up to $14000. Let's try to reach an agreement that works for both of us.

I understand that $14000 is still a bit lower than my target price, but I'm willing to make another compromise. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $16000. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business, and I'm willing to meet you halfway again.
Alice, I'm  getting closer to your price point, but $16000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $15000, but that's my absolute maximum.  Let's try to find a way to finalize the deal.

I understand that you're getting close to your maximum budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $16250. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business, and I'm willing to meet you halfway again.
